item.title: Theme Documentation - Advanced
item.description: Ideal is an opinionated theme with a focus on minimalism and simplicity. Content Types This theme supports two types of content types: post and page.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: My Website Journey
item.description: Hey there!, Adit’s here, and this is my first post. I want to share a story of my journey in creating this site, my portfolio website.

item.title: Emoji Support for you it's a fenomenal
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes.

Hey there, Adit’s here! Hey, I’m Adit. I’m Indonesian college student majoring informatics. Welcome to my spot on the web for projects I’ve created, posts I’ve written, and anything else I want to show the world.

item.title: Bl端dhaven
item.description: History Bl端dhaven was a former whaling town, which was officially incorporated as a “Commonwealth” in 1912. The town had a generally poor socio-economic populace, owing in part to failed efforts to transform itself into a manufacturing and shipping center.
